name: Bitcoin Second Chance
description: Bitcoin Second Chance (BTC) is a cryptocurrency on the Binance Smart Chain designed for individuals who missed early Bitcoin opportunities. The project provides a capped-supply token of 21,000,000 tokens and uses a deflationary model with manual burns to gradually reduce the circulating supply. It aims to create scarcity, maintain long-term community value, and offer an accessible memecoin experience inspired by Bitcoinâ€™s early history. The smart contract is publicly verifiable, and the project maintains active community engagement through social media and its website.
